item.title: Barriers to Adopting Technology for Teaching and Learning
item.description: This is a study done over a decade ago on how the learning environment changed as new technology was rolled in. While it is a bit dated, the points relevant to our topic are still valid today. It discusses how the learning curve can slow things down and how failure of systems is a major problem in getting things done.

item.title: Technical Barriers to Communication
item.description: This article discusses the communication challenges faced by a wide range of industries brought on by globalization. It is not specific to technological barriers but it is a good place to start to have a general understanding of the issues faced.
